narrative.title: 7Th Armoured Division - 1940Q2
narrative.situation: British Armoured Division deployed in North Africa during 1940Q2.
narrative.objectives: Mobile armoured division for desert warfare - reconnaissance in force, defensive operations, and rapid response to Italian incursions
narrative.axis_objective: Hold current positions and prevent Allied breakthrough.
narrative.allied_objective: Advance and neutralize Axis defensive positions.

supply.notes: Supply base at Mersa Matruh, forward dumps along Egyptian frontier

air_support.note: No theater air summary available for this quarter

supply_states.notes: Supply base at Mersa Matruh, forward dumps along Egyptian frontier
